title: Urban Mining by Syed Adil Abbas - Muscat Daily
summary: The global transition to green energy requires a shift towards renewable sources and essential raw materials such as lithium, cobalt and copper. However, these materials can be repeatedly used, in theory, indefinitely if products are designed for reusability and recycling. The article highlights the concept of 'urban mining' as a way to recover valuable metals from discarded electronics, promoting a circular economy and reducing the environmental impact of the green transition.
